import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-product-card', templateUrl: './create-product-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-product-card.component.css'] }) export class CreateProductCardComponent { @Output() closeForm: EventEmitter = new EventEmitter(); onCloseForm(){ this.closeForm.emit(false) } onProductFormSubmitted(productForm:NgForm){ console.log('ee'); } }
